summary.para: The CRYPT_TIME_STAMP_REQUEST_INFO structure is used for time stamping. To add an authenticated attribute when signing an executable file to verify the date and time of the signature, a signed time stamp is requested from a time stamp server. The CRYPT_TIME_STAMP_REQUEST_INFO structure is used to get a time stamp. It contains the signature bits of the material being time stamped in the Content field.
The object identifier (OID) that specifies the desired format of the time stamp, usually UTC.
The OID of the Content Type of the content, usually DATA.
A CRYPT_OBJID_BLOB structure that contains the encoded signature bits of the material being time stamped.
The number of elements in the rgAttribute array.
Array of pointers to structures, each holding an encoded attribute.
